content.rendered:
The series of tutorials below have been created by the Office of Student Accounts to assist you through various processes and procedures at the University of La Verne. Please reference each of the links which will direct you to our video tutorial. A PDF script of the instructions are also available for your convenience.

Video Tutorial PDF
How to Access La Verne Portal and My Student Account Center English Tutorial Instructions
How to Sign your Financial Responsibility Agreement Instructions
How to Make a Payment Online Instructions
How to Set-up an eRefund Profile Instructions
How to Set-up a Payment Plan Instructions
How to Establish a Payer Instructions
How to Reset the password for a Payer Instructions
How to Set-up Automated Payments for a Payment Plan Instructions
How to Make an Online Payment without Tuition Charges Instructions
How to Make a Fee Payment (Graduation, Appeal, Misc.) Instructions
How to Delete a Saved Payment Method in the My Student Account Center
 Instructions
PDC – How to Pay your Appeal Fee Online Instructions
How to Accept Your ULV Loan
 Instructions
